about_the_game:
ChainKit Builder is virtual workshop where you can experience the joy of building model kits. Assemble, cut, paint, kitbash and customize your models with precision and creativity.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

  • Build: Snap parts together with satisfying realism.

  • Paint: Use various paint tools to add color and detail.

  • Cut: Trim parts for a perfect fit.

  • Cleaning: Remove mold lines and prepare parts for painting.

  • Change Mat: Swap out cutting mat for different effects.

  • Decals: Apply and customize stickers for authenticity.

  • Photo Mode: Take a photo of model kits with different background.

  • Workshop Showcase: Build own workshop from zero to hero.

  • Kitbash: Combine parts from different model kits to create something new.

  • Relaxing Music: Choose different soundtrack while enjoy building model kit.

Dive into the relaxing yet challenging world of model building without the mess. Perfect for hobbyists or anyone looking to try their hand at crafting detailed models.

MODEL KIT GRADES

SG = Standard Grade

NG = Novice Grade

EG = Elite Grade

PG = Prime Grade

WISHLIST NOW

Start your collection and become a master model kit builder with ChainKit Builder on Steam.

name: ChainKit Builder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later 64bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later 64bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Build, paint, and customize model kits in this immersive virtual workshop. Snap parts together, apply decals, paint with precision, and even kitbash for unique creations. Experience the satisfaction of model kit building without the mess.
